contexts.context: ...for the Wheeler thing. Tell her to tell <mark>Betty</mark> Ewing too for me— Also call Sophie— on...
...all to & gather for Christmas. We telephoned <mark>Betty</mark> & offically invite her -and she says she is...
...to have the whole family together again. I'm telephoning <mark>Betty</mark> Brattontonight find out whether she can come and if...
...I haven't been able to get in touch with <mark>Betty</mark> Bratton yet but I shall probably phone her tonight...
